耼字的基本解释

耼
dān
同“聃”。

耼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dān］
同“聃1”。

耼字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耳字部】　耼； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页966第08
【唐韻】他酣切【集韻】【韻會】他甘切，?音舑。【說文】耳曼也。【徐曰】耳無郭也。【廣韻】耳漫無輪。　又【韻會】祝耼，老耼，人名。【左傳·隱九年】戎人之前，遇覆者奔，祝耼逐之。【註】祝耼，鄭大夫。【前漢·揚雄傳】弃由耼之所珍兮。【註】師古曰：耼，老耼也。　又國名。【左傳·僖二十三年】管蔡郕霍，魯衞毛耼。【周語】耼由鄭姬。【註】耼，姬姓。　又【正韻】都甘切【正韻】都含切，?音耽。又【集韻】乃甘切，音䛁。又【類篇】謨甘切，音姏。又【正韻】那含切，音南。義?同。　【類篇】或作?。【正字通】今俗作聃。

耼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
耼字的起名意思

暂无。

聃

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Ear word department] 　聃; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: Page 966 08
[Tang Yun] He cuts heartily [Jiyun] [Yunhui] He cuts willingly, "Yinfu." [Said the text] Erman also. [Xu Yue] There is no Guo in my ears. [Guangyun] There are no wheels in the ears.　[Yunhui] Zhu Dan, old man, name. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Nine Years] Before the Rong people, I ran for the overturned, and Zhu Dan chased it. [Note] Zhu Dan, Doctor Zheng. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Abandoning what you treasured. [Note] Shi Gu said: Yan, old Yan also.　 Also the name of the country. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-Three Years] Guan Cai Yaohuo, Lu Wei Maohan. 【Zhou Yu】Tan Yu Zheng Ji. 【Note】Tan, Ji's surname.　[Zheng Yun] All cuts are willing to cut [Zheng Yun] all cuts,? Sound is delayed. Also [Jiyun] Nai Ganqie, sound 囁. Also 【Classes】Moganqie, sound concubine. [Zheng Yun] Na Hanqie, Yinnan. Righteous? Same.　【Classification】Or as?. [Zhengzitong] This is a common practice.
